figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Flowchart showing the selection process for the data set for analysis from Farm Ranch Health and Safety Surveys 2018 and 2020 combined.

claims.sentence: From the 2018 survey, after the cleansing of addresses, a total of 16,826 farm operations were included in the mailings, while for the 2020 survey, this number increased to 17,328 (Figure 1).
